question: a magazine wants to include contributions from readers for an article called ‘the book that influenced me most’. Write a letter to the editor of the magazine about the book that influence d you most. In your letter:Describe this book was about Explain how this book influenced you Say whether this book would be likely to influence other people
text: I am writing in reference to your request which was published in the ‘’readers column’’ last week for/ in order to introduce an influential book by readers.

It is the most informative book that I have read so far and I finished it a couple of months ago. Its name is ‘’how repel negatives thoughts’’. I have learned how to overcome negative waves of my mind and set myself a goal then concentrate on it. In addition, it represents perfect procedures for making decisions in hard situations.

In my perspective, it has had a great influence on achieving my goals. I have to admit that I had struggled with the negatives beliefs as well I dwell upon my past nasty experiences whereas ,currently I know how to manage them and never give up hope.

I highly recommend that people require to benefit from its constructive comments in order to enhance their lifestyle. Furthermore, the new generation can consider it as the main resource to give themselves something to aim for their objectives.
